description:
It is the age of Civil War, a time of warlords and violence.  Yasaburo Manajiri is a ninja without a purpose, and the only survivor from his clan.  The he meets Rangiku Fumiwatari, whose family has been brutally murdered by the henchmen of General Karimata.  Now Rangiku fights, using her fatherâ€™s strange puppets, the very creations General Karimata was out to capture.  Together with Manajiri, Rangiku fights through 16th century Japan and soaks the dusty streets in blood.  When the Puppet Princess makes her puppets dance, they fight until only the bitter taste of vengeance remains.
Source: crunchyroll
